tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE Boxers (
    boxer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    weight_class VARCHAR(20),
    country VARCHAR(50),
    wins INT,
    losses INT
)

CREATE TABLE Boxers (
    boxer_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    weight_class VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
    age INT NOT NULL,
    country VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE Tournament (
    tournament_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    tournament_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    location VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    start_date DATE NOT NULL,
    end_date DATE NOT NULL,
    prize_money DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE Boxers (
    boxer_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    boxer_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    weight_class VARCHAR(50),
    age INT,
    country VARCHAR(50),
    wins INT,
    losses INT
);

CREATE TABLE Tournaments (
    tournament_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    tournament_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    location VARCHAR(100),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Matches (
    match_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    tournament_id INT,
    boxer1_id INT,
    boxer2_id INT,
    winner_id INT,
    match_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE tournaments (
    tournament_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(100),
    location VARCHAR(100),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE matches (
    match_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    tournament_id INT,
    boxer1_id INT,
    boxer2_id INT,
    winner_id INT,
    match_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (tournament_id) REFERENCES tournaments(tournament_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (boxer1_id) REFERENCES boxers(boxer_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (boxer2_id) REFERENCES boxers(boxer_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (winner_id) REFERENCES boxers(boxer_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Boxers (
    boxer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    boxer_name VARCHAR(50),
    weight_class VARCHAR(20),
    age INT,
    country VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE Tournaments (
    tournament_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    tournament_name VARCHAR(50),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE Matches (
    match_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    tournament_id INT,
    boxer1_id INT,
    boxer2_id INT,
    winner_id INT,
    match_date DATETIME
)

CREATE TABLE Judges (
    judge_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    judge_name VARCHAR(50),
    nationality VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE MatchResults (
    result_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    match_id INT,
    round_number INT,
    result_description TEXT,
    winner_id INT
)
